content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, I'm sure you'll understand that such a prime location does come at a price. I'm looking to rent it out for an amount that truly reflects its value. Let's negotiate. How does 1000 euros sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hi Mr. Schmidt, the apartment is really nice and the location is perfect, but as a student, I'm on a tight budget. I'm smart and not easily tricked, so I'm looking for a fair price. I'm also dependable and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, so I'm willing to pay 600 euros. This is the highest I can pay for this apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your honesty. However, I must admit, 600 euros is far below what I expect for this apartment. I do value your dependability and responsibility, but the price you're offering is simply not acceptable. I'm not interested in continuing the negotiation, because the price you're offering is far too low for the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hi Mr. Schmidt, I understand that 600 euros might be too low for this apartment. However, as a student, I'm really trying to save money. I'm also smart, so I'm not easily tricked into paying more than I should. I'm willing to pay 700 euros, which is the highest I can pay for this apartment. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your offer of 700 euros is closer to my expectations, but it's still not what I believe the apartment truly deserves. I appreciate your willingness to pay more, but I must respectfully decline. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth more than what you're offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hi Mr. Schmidt, I understand that my previous offer might not have been fair. I'm willing to pay 800 euros, which is the highest I can pay for this apartment. I hope this offer is more acceptable to you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your offer of 800 euros is much closer to my expectations. I appreciate your understanding and the effort you're putting into finding a fair price. I agree to the price of 900 Euro! Let's move forward with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
